com.androidquery
Class AbstractAQuery<T extends AbstractAQuery<T>>

java.lang.Object
  com.androidquery.AbstractAQuery<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the generic type
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants
Direct Known Subclasses:
AQuery
public abstract class AbstractAQuery<T extends AbstractAQuery<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constants

The core class of AQuery. Contains all the methods available from an AQuery object.
